Mobile-Friendly Web Design

Remember the last time you went to a non mobile website on your phone? The tiny text. The dreaded fat finger. A panic in your chest and the strong urge to flee. It’s a memory too painful to consider.

Now imagine your visitors have the same experience when they get to your site. If you’re like many small businesses, more than half of your visitors will come to your website on a smartphone or tablet.

And mobile users are a fickle bunch. If things don’t work the first time, they’re moving on. Let us make even your most persnickety visitors happy with responsive web design that scales beautifully to mobile.

Built on WordPress

We love WordPress for small business clients because it’s easy to learn and lets you manage and update your content yourself. Plus, WordPress offers more flexibility and scalability than most DIY website builders.

We’ll set you up with a custom fields-driven admin panel that makes it easier for you to add and update content without breaking the look and feel of your custom design.

Then we’ll make sure you know how to use it with one-on-one training and a take-home CMS guide on how to update your site.

Intuitive User Experience

What do you want your users to do when they get to your website? And what do your users want to do when they get to your website?

Our designers works closely with our content strategists to help create intuitive user paths that help guide your visitors to the content most important to both your business goals and the goals of your users.

From wireframes and site architecture to content optimization and user path analysis, our design and development choices are backed with a purpose: to move visitors seamlessly toward your calls to action.

Your Business Deserves a Better Website

That’s why we’re here! And we can’t wait to help you get started. Just tell us what you need and we’ll get in touch for a complimentary consultation.

You need a partner that understands the particular challenges small businesses face. Luckily, that’s what we’re all about. Let our team of experts take your small business website to big places.
